latest_revision.text:
Ryan Rix is HeatSync Labs' Secretary of the Board. But that doesn't matter,
he'd rather talk about
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/hslphotosync/7225303510/in/photostream rockets]
or 3D printing.

Ryan's really good at:
* Software Development
** Ruby on Rails
** Javascript
** Cross platform Mobile applications
** Qt/C++
* Linux Administration
* 3D Printing
* Breaking shit

Ryan's one of the "day crowd" people, working on software contracts during the
day and building cool things at night. Basically, he gets paid to hang out at
HSL and show people the cool toys we have. He's also in charge of the 3D
printing station and the monthly 3D printing nights. Ryan is one of the guys
in charge of the IT, along with [[User:will]] and [[User:uberschnitzel]]. Ryan
created the tablet/phone doorlock control application and is in charge of our
[[SpaceAPI]] endpoint.

If you need to get a hold of Ryan, he's reachable on Twitter (@rrrrrrrix) or
email (ry@n.rix.si) or in the space.
